QuestData.Title: Note to William
QuestData.Description: I bet William Pestle has a potion to unite our two young lovers!$B$BHere, take this note to William. He's staying at the Lion's Pride Inn in Goldshire.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take Gramma Stonefield's Note to William Pestle.
QuestData.CompletionText: You have a note from "Gramma" Stonefield, eh? I haven't seen Mildred in years! I wonder what she has to say...
QuestData.RewardText: My heart goes out to those two poor souls, Maybell and Tommy Joe. I remember being young and in love, once.$B$BThere must be something I can do to help them! Let me think...
